attributes.action: Introduce an Emergency Grant to all individuals affected by Corona Virus.
attributes.additional_details:
Poverty kills. We have seen the effects of this through the brutal cuts of the last ten years of austerity. Inequality ruins communities and panic buying particularly impacts those on a low income who cannot afford to bulk buy in advance. 

Please support the most vulnerable in society by taking away the bureaucracy and humiliation of filling out 'benefit' claims when there is a global pandemic.  Please act now to save lives.
attributes.background: Introduce an Emergency Grant to financially support those who are affected by the Corona Virus, particularly the elderly, the disabled, the homeless and the vulnerable.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
